entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming southeast 20 this evening then light late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
